alert.note: Alert for St. Clair; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Talladega and south central St. Clair Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Logan Martin Lake, or over Pell City, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Talladega, Pell City, Lincoln, Alpine Bay Resort, Coosa Island, Harrisburg, Alpine, Logan Martin Lake, Country Club Estates, St. Clair County Airport, Cropwell and Howells Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
